list.name: MAGNETIC-FIELD
list.description: While the Knuckle Busters are on the ground, Sam can activate them to pull in nearby enemies.
list.descriptionHtml: While the Knuckle Busters are on the ground, Sam can activate them to pull in nearby enemies.

list.name: PULSE-REPELLENT
list.description: Upon landing on the ground, Sam's next deployed Knuckle Busters releases an electric pulse that knocks back enemies.
list.descriptionHtml: Upon landing on the ground, Sam's next deployed Knuckle Busters releases an electric pulse that knocks back enemies.
